name: CyberTrail
description:
CyberTrail is a Sci-Fi Endless Runner game where you control a futuristic vehicle and your main objective is to avoid the incoming obstacles and survive as long as you can.

Use different pickups which can be collected on the go and which will help you survive longer.

Use the points collected to purchase "Wrenches" from in-game shop which can be used to repair your vehicle after crashing to continue your adventure. 

Controls:     A : Move left,     D : Move Right,     E : Use Bomb. 

(P.S : This is my first ever game developed using Unity3D, please give your valuable feedback in the comments section below even if you hate the game. Thankyou!)
